channel.title: player economy on ShadowNode Modded Game Servers
channel.description: Recent content in player economy on ShadowNode Modded Game Servers

item.title: Market
item.description: Note This mod only works on our Modded 1.12 servers The Market The market plugin is a custom plugin that allows you to buy/sell/trade items in a text-based marketplace. Running /market help in game will return a list of commands. How to Access the Market To view the current listings, type the command /market How to buy an item You can either browse the market or you can click on the Search Seller button to find a specific player’s listening.
